parameters:
\N<Ryuda Soldier>This is a facility managed by us of Ryuda. It is not a place
where you can freely enter.
weather : 0 : 5 : 5 : 15 : 1 : Light_01D : 1
weather : 1 : 5 : 5 : 5 : 1 : Light_01C : 1
air05
air08
<ActiveMessage:\C[1]■EV発生■>

\N<Ryuda Soldier>Halt, where do you think you're going? You cannot enter the
ruins ahead without official permission.
I want to enter the ruins.
I don't have any particular business.
遺跡内へ入りたい

\N<Segi>I intend to enter the ruins. I've heard that all who
participate in the Training Corps use this place to hone
themselves.

\N<Ryuda Soldier>You, a warrior participating in the Training Corps? Then you
must be well aware of the regulations for entering the
ruins. You should have been briefed by Lord Zuuteruka
beforehand.
\N<Segi>Regulations for entry...?

\N<Ryuda Soldier>Exactly. It's a necessary precaution. The ruins are a den of
dangerous and ferocious monsters. If you plan to step
inside, you must be properly prepared.

\N<Ryuda Soldier>Moreover... if it's someone as frail as you, a woman, then
all the more reason.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Ryuda Soldier>Ah, I see, you're that female warrior. The one who joined
the Training Corps to seek a pardon for her husband, who
became a criminal...
\N<Segi>My husband is... not a criminal.

\N<Ryuda Soldier>Hmph, then all the more you should know, right? For the
matches and entry into the ruins, one must wear appropriate
attire and prepare the designated weapons provided by us
Ryudas.
\N<Segi>Appropriate attire...
\N<Ryuda Soldier>...Is there a problem? Are you going to give up on entering?
\N<Segi>That is...

\N<Ryuda Soldier>Whether you enter the ruins to train yourself before facing
the Training Corps, or go into battle as you are now, it's
up to you.

\N<Ryuda Soldier>We will not force either path on you. But if you decide to
enter, then go to the office and make the necessary
preparations.
\N<Segi>...
DW_目標設定 Acquire_the_Lyuda_attire_for_entering_the_ruins.
A
特に用事は無い

\N<Ryuda Soldier>If you say you're entering the lakebed ruins, then go to the
guardhouse and make the proper preparations.

\N<Ryuda Soldier>Hmm... It seems you've dressed as instructed. Then I shall
permit your entry into the ruins... heh.

\N<Ryuda Soldier>If you say you're entering the lakebed ruins, then go to the
guardhouse and make the appropriate preparations.

\N<Ryuda Soldier>Hmm... It seems you've donned the attire as instructed. Then
I shall permit your entry into the ruins... heh.

\N<Ryuda Soldier>The appraisal facility is closed. If you wish to enter the
ruins, make sure to obtain official permission.
